name: CoolPaintrVR
description:
Live the awesome experience of painting in 3D space… It’s like getting inside your own creation!

CoolPaintrVR is the relaxed VR family experience you were looking for.

Imagine drawing in 3D space with a large collection of brushes, primitive shapes, tubes, particles and many other stunning effects, while listening to your favourite music playable from CoolPaintrVR via an USB stick.

Imagine being lost in your own creative universe, using the zoom feature to build a small world within another, hiding mysterious secrets that the rest of the community should try to figure out.

Imagine sharing your creations with the CoolPaintrVR community, getting to the web site www.coolpaintrvr.com, where you may upload your works and download those from the rest of users.

Imagine a sophisticated 3D engine capable of maintaining stable 120fps, that is able to turn your playing time into a smooth, accurate and motion sickness free experience...

All of this is CoolPaintrVR, your mind is the only limit!

1 player
200MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
PlayStation®VR Required
PlayStation®Camera Required
Enhanced play with 1 PS®Move controller

Express your mind freely, share it with the world, and let your imagination flow into space!
